column5: This private room is located in South Arlington. We are a 22 minute drive from the Cowboys stadium, Hurricane Harbor Water Park, Rangers Ball park, and Six Flags over Texas. It is a great location if you are trying to catch a ball game with an Uber and want to avoid all of the traffic. We are a 13 minute drive from the Parks at Arlington mall and Highlands shopping Center. This private room contains a queen sized bed, 32\
